item.title: Setting up a task scheduler in Flask
item.description: Table of Contents Let’s go hacking Monitoring events Conclusion The first thing that comes to mind while considering a task scheduler is a cron job. As most of the today’s servers are hosted on linux machines, setting a cron job for periodic task might seem like a good option for many. However in production having a crontab is nothing but a pain in the a**.
